description.en: After a weird hundred years where ghost were appearing, only one-tenth of mankind remained and the number of ghosts exceeding the number of humans remaining! In order to survive, humans needed to choose a “companion ghost” from birth, and constantly cultivate their own companion ghost so that they can be used to fight against other ghosts. The world has entered a weird era of co-existence with ghosts! With the help of the system, the invincible ghost cultivated by Lin Feng causes the whole world to tremble

“The brilliant actor, famous Baekhyun, before he dies, encounters a miracle and travels back in time! But there’s nothing free about time travel. His lifespan ends at thirty, and he has only ten years left. To return as an actor and stay alive, he must become an ‘idol’! Experience the journey of the talented performance star as he rises to the top ranks of idols, an exciting story awaits!”

altTitles.ja: 100年の推し

description.en: This is a story about the main character named Inuyama, who is on the edge of life with no job or savings. One day, he is tasked with the role of "broadcast advisor" and "pseudo-boyfriend" of a gravure idol. Can he reach the top of the world of gravure in this romantic comedy harem? ♡
description.ja: 職なし、貯金なしの人生崖っぷちな主人公・狗山（いぬやま）が、ある日任されたのはグラビアアイドルの「配信アドバイザー」兼、「疑似彼氏」!? グラビア界のてっぺん目指すハーレムラブコメ♡

description.en:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

altTitles.en: I Stayed at Home for a Century, When I Emerged I Was Invincible
I've Been Home for a Hundred Years and I'm Invincible When I Go Out

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Zhai Liao Bainian Chumen Yi Wudi

altTitles.zh: 我宅了百年出门已无敌

altTitles.en: Invincible After a Hundred Years of Seclusion

description.en:
He clearly transmigrated into the body of the young master of a powerful aristocratic family in the fantasy world, but was sent out of his ancestral home and made to live in a remote courtyard!? But Chu Xuan doesn’t care at all, because he has a system that will help him get stronger! As long as he stay at home long enough, he can become strong! Ding~ Stayed at home for a day, reward- Indestructible Body Technique… Ding~ Stayed at home for a year, reward- Yuxu Celestial Scripture and 100 years of cultivation… Ding~ Stayed at home for ten years,… Since no one wants me to go out, I, Chu Xuan, I’m going to stay at home!

Note: There is no Chapter 102 in the raws.

title.en: The Story of a Scary Consignee

altTitles.ja: 配達先のお姉さんが怖すぎる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Haitatsu-saki no Onee-san ga Kowa Sugiru Hanashi

altTitles.es-la: La Historia de un destinatario aterrador

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cô nàng nhận hàng đáng sợ

description.en: An introverted part-time food delivery guy working in the countryside receives a food delivery order. When he reaches the delivery address, he discovers that the recipient is a tall and intimidating-like woman. However, as the story unfolds, he eventually discovers…
description.es-la: Un introvertido repartidor de comida a tiempo parcial que trabaja en el campo recibe un pedido de comida a domicilio. Cuando llega a la dirección de entrega, descubre que la destinataria es una mujer alta y de aspecto intimidatorio. Sin embargo, a medida que avanza la historia, descubrirá que...

description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

description.en: A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.
description.pt: A história se passa em um colégio católico, onde a doce e gentil Song Ayeon, passa seus dias de tormento sofrendo Bullyng dia após dia, até que um "anjo" Baek Yeinhwa à salva com suas "boas" intenções, mas por trás dessa bondade toda ela têm seus motivos pra salvar a pobre donzela das garras…

description.en: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.

altTitles.ja: 時が留まった家

description.en: An abused little girl with nothing to live for meets an old man with a nasty personality.
description.es-la: Una noche, una niña sirvienta se encuentra escapando de su sadico dueño noble, dirigiendose al lugar donde le dijo su persona mas querida ''alli hay 'álgo', pidele a ese 'álgo' que te proteja'' pero al llegar pasa algo inesperado...

description.en: Mooyoung spent his childhood under his stepfather’s oppressive rule, a life that felt like living in hell. A mysterious voice in the living hell showed him the way to survive. “Live someone else’s life instead of yours.” That’s how his acting journey began… Was it a survival instinct? Even when he did well, he excelled too much. Through acting, Mooyoung gained a new life. This is the story of Mooyoung, the overwhelming acting genius, embarking on a challenge in the entertainment industry!

title.en: Saotome Shimai wa Manga no Tame nara!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Saotome Shimai Ha Manga no Tame Nara!?

altTitles.ru: Если бы сёстры Саотомэ сделали это для манги?!

altTitles.ja: 早乙女姉妹は漫画のためなら!?

altTitles.zh: 早乙女姐妹为了漫画的话！？

altTitles.en: If the Saotome Sisters Did it For Manga!?

altTitles.fr: Les sœurs Saotome sont prêtes à tout pour leur manga !?

description.en: A screwball ecchi romantic comedy about a young potential mangaka dealing with assistants who are his sisters as they are madly in love with him.
description.pt: Uma excêntrica comédia romântica sobre um jovem mangaká com potencial que lida com assistentes que são suas irmãs, e que também são loucamente apaixonados por ele.
description.pt-br: Uma excêntrica comédia romântica sobre um jovem mangaká com potencial que lida com assistentes que são suas irmãs, e que também são loucamente apaixonados por ele.

description.en: In Gyeongseong, the city of glittering lights and glamorous desire, Gyeongseong Detective Agency has opened its doors at No. 45, District 1, Myeongchijeong. Sohwa, a 16-year-old servant girl, has nothing to her name but her wits and bravery. When she accidentally gets caught up in a secret scheme, she meets Jeong Haegyeong, a young man running his own detective agency. Chased by memories from the past, they must work together to clear her name.

title.en: Erosugi Cheat de Isekai Harem♪ Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: エロすぎチートで異世界ハーレム♪コミックアンソロジー

altTitles.en: Otherworldly Harem with Extremely Erotic Cheats Comic Anthology

description.en:
An erotic isekai anthology comic by various 
1. My Cute Seedstock-San by [Kaworu Watashiya](mangaka.https://mangadex.org/author/9e5885df-6e1c-496f-9cf9-22f649ba4696/watashiya-kaworu) 
2. I love both big and small ones by [Amamiya Mizuki](https://mangadex.org/author/a27cfcf4-4ee5-4893-8171-19022dc240ee/amamiya-mizuki) 
3. Heart racing ♡ Maternal Instinct Blossom Harem by [Meisuke](https://mangadex.org/author/a6ace81e-ab56-4023-91f3-8db574f0f54b/meisuke) 
4. Goddess and Hero by [Mamo Williams](https://mangadex.org/author/6cf47ca2-2810-4c18-8852-eac4f44579b4/mamo-williams) 
5. Parallel World Cooking Paradise by [Guts Shihan](https://mangadex.org/author/3c238a89-9576-425c-8203-f769f65b59c2/guts-shihan)
6. Be Careful During the Mating Season! by [Omori Gohan](https://mangadex.org/author/a7a89851-905d-4806-9206-5ab1e6214e44/omori-gohan)
description.ja:
スキル覚醒→推しの娘みんなと即ハーレム11名の豪華執筆陣が彩る、理想の異世界へG O！

異世界ヒロイン全員オレのもの！　覚醒チートでエッチなハーレム結成！　姫騎士・エルフ・魔王様・サキュバス５姉妹・聖女・ドワーフ・単眼・ロリ魔法使い・天使・ホムンクルス・令嬢・ハーピー・眼鏡・くの一・獣人・爆乳お姉さんパーティー――あなたの推しヒロイン、みんなとイチャイチャできちゃうハーレムアンソロジー！！！

description.en: Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

altTitles.ja: ニンゲンの飼い方

altTitles.en: How to Care For Your Human

description.en:
**What is a *Human*?**

This is a world in which monsters and demons live. Every few years, a *Human* appears, almost as if they are reborn here.  
These *Humans* require great care when picking food for them. They become sick at the slightest change in temperature. They get hurt from the smallest of falls.  
But *Humans*, unlike Une (dogs), Nosa (cats), and Eshigu (rabbits), have a unique kind of loyalty and intelligence, and even something endearing about them...  

A diary manga about an encounter and their daily life. Along with its illustrated guide, this book is a great pickup for first-time *Human* owners!

In a world where the Han Empire never fell, martial arts is a power used to squeeze the people dry. So when a new continent is discovered, both good and evil men alike flee to settle there and escape the tyranny of the Emperor, opening up the era of a Martial Wild West.

In the turbulent frontier, Zhang Qian is a man that reincarnated from our cushy, modern world, but his new world is nothing like the fantastical world he dreamed about from reading martial arts novels. While the martial arts in his new world are powerful, they are also too crude and lack elegance. And so Qian journeys the new continent for his dream of bringing true martial arts back to the new martial realm.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo que o Império Han nunca caiu, artes marciais são um poder usado para oprimir as pessoas. Então quando um novo continente é descoberto, tanto os bons quanto os maus fogem para se estabelecer e fugir da tirania do Imperador, dando início a era do Oeste Selvagem Marcial. Na turbulenta fronteira, Zhang Qian é um homem que reencarnou do nosso mundo moderno e confortável, mas seu novo ambiente não é nada como o mundo fantasioso com o qual ele sonhava ao ler novels de artes marciais. Enquanto as artes marciais em seu novo mundo são poderosas, elas também são grosseiras demais e não tem elegância. E assim Qian começa sua jornada pelo continente pelo sonho de trazer as artes marciais de verdade para o novo reino marcial.

description.en:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and it's neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"!
Feelings that couldn't be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

altTitles.ja: おそとごはんをご一緒に

altTitles.zh: 邀你一起在户外共进美餐

altTitles.id: Ayo makan di Luar ruangan bersama

description.ja:
アパートの狭いキッチンに悩む料理好きの女子大生・風香が出会ったのは、料理が苦手で破天荒なアウトドア女子・よもぎだった。
成り行きで始まったたふたりのおそとごはんは、なんだかとっても温かくて…
女ふたりの助け合いアウトドアグルメ漫画スタート！

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title.en: Was Manager Seo Disposed of as an Industrial Accident?

description.en:
“Why do you care about those non-paying users?”

Seo Seo-hyeok, a game planner who gave up on the quality and only focused on the paid contents. But why did he die from overwork after working all night out of greed to make money? When he opened my eyes again, perhaps fortunately out of misfortune...
'This is the game I was making...!!'

As the devil-like planner who harassed gamers reaped what he sowed, his suffering with the transformation of the game begins!

altTitles.ja: オーク英雄物語　～忖度列伝～
オーク英雄物語 忖度列伝

altTitles.zh-hk: 獸人英雄物語　～忖度列傳～
獸人英雄物語 忖度列傳

description.en:
Bash, the Orc Warrior, is a Hero. During the war, he crushed and defeated all that stood in his path. He is respected by all Orcs as the Orc among Orcs, however Bash has a secret.

He has no experience with women – he, the Hero, was a virgin. For Orcs, who hold combat and sexual prowess in high regard, being a virgin is tremendously shameful. [The fact that I’m a not only a virgin, but a virgin Orc Hero, is a shame for all of Orcish society. I want a wife too!] With this in mind, he decides to embark on a journey.

In order to protect the pride and honor of his race, but mostly to finally get his d*ck wet, he decides to go to leave on a grand quest to find himself a woman.
description.es:
Bash, el Orco Guerrero, es un Héroe.   
Durante la guerra, aplastó y derroto a todos los que se interpusieran en su camino, todos los orcos lo respetaban como El ORCO entre los ORCOS.  
Sin embargo, Bash tenía un gran secreto… El era completamente Virgen, no tenía ningún tipo de experiencia con las Mujeres, y para los Orcos, que eran combatientes feroces y tenían una alta destreza sexual… ser Virgen era una completa deshonra.  
  
[El Hecho de que no solo era virgen, sino también un Héroe Orco Virgen, era una vergüenza para toda la raza Orco, ‘¡Yo también quiero una esposa!’] y con eso en mente Bash decide emprender su viaje, para proteger su orgullo y el Honor de su raza, pero sobre todo para despojarse de su virginidad.


---
description.ru:
Баш, воин орков и Герой.

Во время войны он сокрушал и побеждал всё, что стояло на его пути. Его уважают все орки как орка среди орков. Однако у Баша есть секрет.

У него нет опыта общения с женщинами — он девственник.

Для орков, которые высоко ценят как боевую, так и сексуальную доблесть, быть девственником чрезвычайно позорно.

«То, что я не только девственник, но и девственник-герой орков, позор для всего общества орков. Я тоже хочу жену!» — подумал Баш и решил отправиться в путешествие, чтобы защитить гордость и честь своей расы, хотя в основном ради того, чтобы наконец найти себе женщину.

От автора популярной серии LN "Mushoku Tensei" (Реинкарнация безработного) идёт ещё один шедевр!

description.en: After Lu Chen entered the cranial neuron quantum transferring game《Empyrean God Realm》—he found himself stripped of his human character, becoming the weakest wild monster in the game, a "Weak Gnoll." Facing players who are ready to use him to level up, Lu Chen lifts the broken Gnoll club and starts to upgrade from a Lv.1 Gnoll. As Lu Chen keeps on killing more and more species, gaining new talents, and levelling up talents, his status keeps getting enhanced. Normal, Strong, Super strong... Soon enough, he...

altTitles.ja: 領民0人スタートの辺境領主様～青のディアスと蒼角の乙女～

altTitles.ja-ro: Ryoumin 0-nin Start no Henkyou Ryoushu-sama ~Ao no Dias to Soukaku no Otome~
Ryomin Zeronin Start no Henkyou Ryoushu-sama

altTitles.en: The Frontier Lord Begins with Zero Subjects: Tales of Blue Dias and the Onikin Alna
The Population of the Frontier Owner Starts With 0. "Dias the Blue" and a Blue-Horned Girl.

altTitles.ru: Население приграничного владения начинается с нуля. «Диас Синий» и голуборогая девушка

altTitles.zh-hk: 從領民0人開始的邊境領主生活

description.en:
Dias fulfilled his parents' will to help others, and kept fighting on the battlefield to that end. Now known as the "Savior Hero" from his long wartime career, he was rewarded with a vast territory from the king. After having met the horned Kijin (鬼人) girl Aruna who lives there, he begins his new slow life as a lord, seeking to thrive in spite of increasingly realizing that he was rewarded with the short end of the stick.  

---

- Japanese Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/177657/)  
- Japanese Web Novel: [syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1980en/)  
- Alternative Raw: [Niconico manga](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39418)  
- Alternative Raw: [comic.pixiv](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/5509)
description.es: Dias cumplió con la voluntad de sus padres de ayudar al prójimo, y peleó en el campo de batalla hasta el final. Ahora conocido como el "Héroe Salvador" debido a sus hazañas de guerra, fue recompensado con un vasto territorio por parte del rey. Después de conocer a la joven de cuernos Kijin (鬼人) Aruna, que vive allí, él comienza su nueva vida como el terrateniente, buscando prosperar a pesar de darse cuenta cada vez más de que lo recompensaron dándole gato por liebre.
description.pt-br: Dias cumpriu a vontade de seus pais em ajudar os outros e continuou lutando no campo de batalha até o fim. Agora conhecido como o "Herói Patriótico" de sua longa carreira em guerra, ele foi recompensado com um vasto território do rei. Depois de conhecer a garota com chifres de Kijin Aruna que mora lá, ele começa sua nova vida como um senhor feudal, procurando prosperar, apesar de perceber cada vez mais que foi recompensado com a ponta curta do bastão.

description.en: Ananta, a barbaric warrior cursed by a demon god. In order to punish the incarnation of the wings, who turned his fate into a tragedy, he endlessly feasts on demon gods in a story of blood, sweat, flesh, and bones that yearns for revenge.

altTitles.ja: ものづくり部

altTitles.en: I'll give my teacher a tickle.

altTitles.ja: 先生のこと、くすぐってあげる

description.en:
Shuuma Aguri isn’t like other high school boys. He doesn’t get into sexual talks with his friends, and he sits alone. While he does have a secret fetish, he keeps it to himself - after all, who would willingly talk to a guy with a tickle fetish?

The only solace he has in his life is Anzu, a girl he met online who herself has a desire to be tickled. The two decide to meet up one day, only for Shuuma to find out that Anzu… is actually his teacher, Maiko Ogura?

title.en: It Was Love at First Sight, Mr. Villain!

description.en:
Duke Adler, referred to as the greatest man of the Asgard Empire, is as handsome as a sculpture. However, he is also a serial killer, playing the role of the villain in a novel. On top of that, Princess Charlotte, who was politically married to him, was fated to be murdered on their first night together.

The predicament is that I am the princess fated to die at his hands on that night.

"It's a political marriage, and it's not as if we want to see each other anyway, so let's just meet on our wedding day."

It was evident that the villain was displeased with the idea of marrying me. Hence, I made a decision.

"It was love at first sight. So, please go out with me!"

With only six months left until the wedding, I resolved to carry out an undercover investigation by pretending to date him. People wouldn't believe my words, so I had no choice but to gather evidence myself.

Even though she had planned to reveal the fact that he was a serial killer by hovering around him...

***

"You said you fell in love with me at first sight, so what were you doing here with another man?"

A cold voice flowed into my ears.

"W-What do you mean? I was just dancing to ensure there were no disruptions at the banquet..."

The nape of my neck heated up from the hot breath brushing against the outer edges of my ear. The contrast between his warm touches and the cool tone of his voice intoxicated me even more.

"You called his name so affectionately, as he held you tightly in his arms."
"Gasp."

Unable to escape the strong scent that clouded my senses, I held my breath. My whole body tingled from the strange sensation spreading from my neck to the rest of my body. He tilted his head and said...

"If there's someone else's scent coming from you... I'll have an urge to kill."

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

description.en: “The Change” brought dungeons filled with monsters into the world, altering reality forever. Pro-gamer Jin Jungdo, whose lifelong dream was to be a hero like the Mana Users who fight in these dungeons, is crushed when he discovers his own abilities are useless. Just then, the “real universe” gives him a set of skills that allow him to draw information from the future and heroes from the past! Now all that’s left is for him to barrel through this game of luck and become the strongest hunter ever!
description.fr: Le pire jour de ma vie, j’ai reçu un miracle comme cadeau de la part du  »véritable univers ».
description.ko: 전 재산을 쏟아부어 헌터로 각성했는데… 전투형 스킬 하나 없는 소통, 인내, 게임 탤런트뿐이라고? 헌터 사무소 영업직 인생은 이제 그만 살고 싶다고...! 간절히 바라면 이루어지는가! 인생 최악의 날, 우주로부터 최강의 스킬을 얻었다! 클래스를 뒤집는 운빨 갓겜이 시작된다. <뽑기로 강해진 SSS급 헌터>
description.ru: В один из худших дней в моей жизни, на меня снизошло чудо в виде подарка от "вселенной".

description.en:
When the threat of the Dungeons looms large in the land of Aria, adventurers rally to explore them in pursuit of fame and fortune. The young alchemist Caldwell is no different, but he faces one huge obstacle: where most everyone is able to cast spells in some form, his pitifully small essence pool means he can't fight using magic like everyone else. He'll need to turn the pacifistic powers of item creation and transmutation into battle techniques in order to survive, and pursue his dream of one day making a name for himself.  
  
Note: Reads Left to Right.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/gelidspace)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/galaxyspark)

Baek Jinwoo, savior of humanity, is done with being a hero. In his last moments, this battle-scarred warrior vows never to pick up a sword again. But by some cruel twist of fate, he finds himself reborn as Riley Finn Epheletta, the youngest son of an esteemed family of swordmasters!

When trouble comes knocking, Riley is forced to make a decision — take up the sword, or let his loved ones die. Will the “Lazy Sword” finally bloom into the legendary swordmaster he was always destined to become?
description.pt-br:
Ele é um guerreiro que foi escolhido pela espada sagrada por causa de sua vontade de salvar a humanidade, mas se cansou de viver para os outros. Pela salvação, ele derrotou o último adversário, o Rei Demônio, e decidiu morrer. Para aliviar o peso de ser um guerreiro e o mestre da espada sagrada, ele iria desistir de sua vida e cair em um descanso profundo…

“Oh! Parece que o jovem mestre quer empunhar uma espada o mais cedo possível!”

“Conde! Olha só o mestre! Ele já está interessado em espadas!”.

O Guerreiro que desistiu de sua vida para fugir da espada acabou reencarnando como filho mais jovem de um mestre espadachim?!

“Eu prefiro morrer de novo!!”

altTitles.ja: 雅血の陰陽師

description.en: A time when the boundary between human and demon was vague. Ten sacred items – “Jingi” had been stolen from Mikado’s Treasury by some demons. An imperial order to recover the Jingi was given to all the Onmyōji in the capital, including “the heretic” – Fuzuki. He sets out to retrieve the first Jingi, but something unthinkable happened…

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.ja: 雨夜の月

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her. [Kodansha]
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

title.en: The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up

description.en:
"Jin Yuseong, the absolute master of the Middle Kingdom, found life too boring. 'I must be crazy. Just unifying the martial world…'"
"'I should have just been a farmer.'"
"'No, I wish I wasn't born at all.'"
"In 'The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up,' one day, he encounters a gate… And upon passing through it, a new world unfolds."
"Jin Yuseong, the top martial deity and leader of the Celestial Demon Cult, arrives in Korea.

title.en: The Game That I Came From

altTitles.ja: ふりだしから始まる覚醒者

description.en:
With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release. But as luck would have it, a glitch in the game's teleportation system takes him back three years into the past with his memories intact.

Now, Ling Ce is determined to utilize his knowledge and experiences to become an awakener and turn his life around. No amount of carnivorous plant monsters or insanity level dungeons will stop the determined hero from reaching the peak!


---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/88411)
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58409509)
description.zh: 带着上一世满级盗贼的记忆，回到三年前，这是命运给凌策的考验还是赏赐？ 既然重生，那上一世未曾达到的、不能守护的、那些只能幻想的，这一世全都要。 更以巅峰造极之态，摧枯拉朽之势，超越极限，成为最强“觉醒者”。

altTitles.ja: ちょいあ!

description.en: 4-koma about an otaku girl and her friends.

After a great catastrophe stuck, humanity started living in anarchy. Acid rain floated across the sky, wild wolves roared in the wilderness, the consortium in the barrier sang night after night, and the refugees outside the wall were hungry and cold. “Ren Xiaosu”, who was born as a refugee, unlocked the palace system and continued to grow stronger by absorbing positive energy, fighting for survival, protecting relatives and friends, saving sentient beings, and gradually changing the world, becoming the dawn of mankind’s future. this is a brand new story… survive the darkness, see the light.

altTitles.ja: カードファイト!! ヴァンガード will+Dress D2

description.en: Mukae Jinki have gathered 15 Fighters, and One who have chosen from winning all the Shop Tournaments. These 16 fighters will fight for the throne to be the strongest, as the Curtain for the Second Deluxe Opens!! Who will be the one to Control the fight, who will be the one to win!?

The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the boss’s room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"
description.ru:
Рэйд провалился. 
В отчаянном положении из-за готовящегося самоподрыва босса данжа преданный тиммейтами Ли Гон-у остался один в комнате босса.
Когда он думал, что уже всё кончено, неожиданно в его руки попадает кинжал. И с этого момента его жизнь кардинально меняется.
Его жизнь спасена, но он снова вернулся на первый уровень, который с таким трудом поднимал...
[Вы поймали "комара". Ваш уровень повышен.]
Действительно, уровень должен был подняться, но почему никаких изменений?

description.en: The story is about Jisuwon, a typical high school freshman with a talent for drawing. He falls for a girl who is already taken, but then meets Seolhyorim, the most beautiful girl in school, and falls for her instantly. He draws pictures of her secretly, but they are discovered by Yang Jinsu and revealed to Seolhyorim. Can Suwon's second first love be maintained?

altTitles.ja: 花唄メモワール

description.en: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
description.ja:
高校最後の夏休み、ひいばあちゃんが営む旅館「花瀧屋」の手伝いにやってきた佐々木梅。
到着したその夜、梅は露天風呂で滑って、湯船に落ちてしまう。
引っ張り上げてくれたのは…〝ねえさま〟と呼んでくる不思議な少女・藤野だった。

いつもと変わらない花瀧屋。
だけど、炭を使った見知らぬ暖房器具があったり、そもそも季節が夏から冬になっていたり。
これって、もしかして…〝タイムスリップ〟？

時代を越え、少女たちの一途な思いが交差する青春冒険譚、第1巻。

altTitles.ja: フールナイト

description.en:
In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?

altTitles.ja: 精霊の農夫

altTitles.th: ชาวสวนภูตคุมวิญญาณ

description.en: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?
description.ja:
超人たちがあらゆる分野で活躍する世界。 金村健吾は、モンスターを倒す超人になろうと小さい頃から訓練を積んでいたが挫折。 その間に弟の金村慎吾が保証人になって姿をくらまし、兄は超人になる夢を諦め帰農した。 しかし、そこで農業の精霊ハワと出会うのだが…！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%95%EB%A0%B9-%EB%86%8D%EC%82%AC%EA%BE%BC/2413)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/59993)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%93/18)
description.ko:
[농사꾼, 정령을 만나다.]

11년 동안 초인이 되기 위해서 노력했지만 결국 일반인으로 끝난 이건우.

모든 걸 뒤로 하고 집으로 돌아왔을 때, 그에게 정령이 찾아왔다.

"하와!!!!"

본격 농사 & 힐링 판타지.

농사의 정령 하와와 함께하는 귀농 Life!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%95%EB%A0%B9-%EB%86%8D%EC%82%AC%EA%BE%BC/2413)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/59993)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%93/18)
description.ru:
Обычный среднестатистический гражданин Кореи, отчаянно пытавшийся стать героем на протяжении 11 лет, осознал, что это не его ремесло и не его мечтания. Бросив все, Ли Ген Ву решил стать фермером и жить своей тихой жизнью. Но все ли так просто?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%95%EB%A0%B9-%EB%86%8D%EC%82%AC%EA%BE%BC/2413)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/59993)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%93/18)
description.th:
'อีกอนอู' ชาวสวนวัย 30 ปี ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นยอดมนุษย์มาตั้งแต่เด็ก
แต่เขาก็ล้มเลิกความฝันนั้น และกลับมาใช้ชีวิตเป็นชาวสวนในชนบทกับครอบครัว
ทว่า เรื่องที่ไม่คาดคิดก็เกิดขึ้น ด้วยความเพียรพยายามในงานสวน ทำให้พลังที่ซ่อนไว้ถูกปลุกขึ้นมา
พร้อมกับภูตน้อย 'ฮาวา' ที่เป็นวิญญาณการเกษตรผู้คอยรับใช้กอนอู และเรื่องราววุ่นๆ ในสวนของพวกเขาก็เริ่มต้นขึ้น

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%95%EB%A0%B9-%EB%86%8D%EC%82%AC%EA%BE%BC/2413)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/59993)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B9%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%93/18)

description.en:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

10 years after the night of starfall, city S was destroyed by the biggest recorded monster outbreak in history. Zuo Fan, carrying the name of [A traitor’s son], as well as being the most useless starfall warrior reserve who ran away, awakened the Super Warrior System during a trap disguised as a raid. Since then, he has embarked on the road of success, rising like a meteor. All the while, searching for the truth of his father’s treason amidst the strong opposition, and gradually commencing on the thorny road of saving the world.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.en: To Be a Power in the Shadows!

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
